Lyric:
[00:01.00]FFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFF
[00:17.53]For all the times that you rained on my parade
[00:21.69]And all the clubs you get in using my name
[00:26.30]You think you broke my heart, oh girl for goodness sake
[00:30.92]You think I'm crying oh my own well no I ain't
[00:35.63]And I didn't wanna write a song cause
[00:37.84]I didn't want anyone thinking I still care
[00:40.73]I don't but you still hit my phone up
[00:45.00]And baby I be movin' on and I think you should be somethin'
[00:49.03]I don't wanna hold back maybe you should know that
[00:53.88]My mama don't like you and she likes everyone
[00:58.26]And I never like to admit that I was wrong
[01:02.76]And I've been so caught up in my job didn't see what's going on
[01:08.07]And now I know I'm better sleeping on my own
[01:12.23]Cause if you like the way you look that much
[01:16.84]Oh baby you should go and love yourself
[01:21.23]And if you think that I'm still holdin' on to somethin'
[01:26.64]You should go and love yourself
[02:07.38]But when you told me that you hated my friends
[02:11.76]The only problem was with you and not them
[02:16.15]And every time you told me my opinion was wrong
[02:21.00]And tried to make me forget where I came from
[02:25.38]And I didn't wanna write a song
[02:21.00]Cause I didn't want anyone thinking I still care
[02:27.69]I don't but you still hit my phone up
[02:34.73]And baby I be movin' on and I think you should be somethin'
[02:38.53]I don't wanna hold back maybe you should know that
[02:43.61]My mama don't like you and she likes everyone
[02:48.00]And I never like to admit that I was wrong
[02:52.50]And I've been so caught up in my job didn't see what's going on
[02:57.46]And now I know I'm better sleeping on my own
[03:01.96]Cause if you like the way you look that much
[03:06.46]Oh baby you should go and love yourself
[03:11.19]And if you think that I'm still holdin' on to somethin'
[03:16.50]You should go and love yourself
[03:38.30]Cause if you like the way you look that much
[03:47.53]And if you think that I'm still holdin' on to somethin'
[03:53.07]You should go and love yourself
[03:56.76]Cause if you like the way you look that much
[04:01.26]Oh baby you should go and love yourself
[04:05.76]And if you think that I'm still holdin' on to somethin'
[04:11.19]You should go and love yourself
